com.github.amenski

Class Chapa

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.amenski.Chapa

  • public class Chapa
extends java.lang.Object
    The Chapa class is the interface to Chapa API to initialize a transaction, verify a transaction and create a sub-account for split payments.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public InitializeResponseData initialize(PostData postData)
                                  throws ChapaException

        This method is used to initialize payment in Chapa. It is an overloaded method of initialize(String).


        Parameters:
        postData - Object of PostData instantiated with post fields.
        Returns:
        An object of InitializeResponseData containing response data from Chapa API.
        Throws:
        ChapaException - Throws an exception for failed request to Chapa API.

      • initialize

        public InitializeResponseData initialize(java.lang.String jsonData)
                                  throws ChapaException

        This method is used to initialize payment in Chapa. It is an overloaded method of initialize(PostData).


        Parameters:
        jsonData - A json string containing post fields.
        Returns:
        An object of InitializeResponseData containing response data from Chapa API.
        Throws:
        ChapaException - Throws an exception for failed request to Chapa API.

      • verify

        public VerifyResponseData verify(java.lang.String transactionRef)
                          throws ChapaException
        Parameters:
        transactionRef - A transaction reference which was associated with tx_ref field in post data. This field uniquely identifies a transaction.
        Returns:
        An object of VerifyResponseData containing response data from Chapa API.
        Throws:
        ChapaException - Throws an exception for failed request to Chapa API.

      • getBanks

        public ResponseBanks getBanks()
                       throws ChapaException
        Returns:
        A list of Bank containing all banks supported by Chapa.
        Throws:
        ChapaException - Throws an exception for failed request to Chapa API.

      • createSubAccount

        public SubAccountResponseData createSubAccount(SubAccountDto subAccountDto)
                                        throws ChapaException

        This method is used to create a sub account in Chapa. It is an overloaded method of createSubAccount(String).


        Parameters:
        subAccountDto - An object of SubAccountDto containing sub-account details.
        Returns:
        An object of SubAccountResponseData containing response data from Chapa API.
        Throws:
        ChapaException - Throws an exception for failed request to Chapa API.

      • createSubAccount

        public SubAccountResponseData createSubAccount(java.lang.String jsonData)
                                        throws java.lang.Throwable

        This method is used to create a sub account in Chapa. It is an overloaded method of createSubAccount(SubAccountDto).


        Parameters:
        jsonData - A json string containing sub account details.
        Returns:
        An object of SubAccountResponseData containing response data from Chapa API.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - Throws an exception for failed request to Chapa API.
